title: Did the Trump Department send 18 tons of personal protective equipment to China in early 2020?
subtitle: The critics questioned the wisdom of exporting to China medical supplies that will soon be in vital need in the United States.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The United States facilitated the dispatch of approximately 17.8 tons of donated medical supplies to China to combat the spread of the new krona virus in early 2020.
